hero.title: The Complete Digital Ecosystem for Medical Professionals

features.title: Built for Medical Professionals
features.subtitle: Experience a platform that understands the unique needs of healthcare providers.

security.title: Medical-Grade Security

cta.subtitle: Dr.Zone AI is not just a platform... it's a complete medical knowledge revolution. Join now and be part of the intelligent generation of doctors.

findYourSpecialty.disclaimerText: This assessment is an exploratory guide only and does not replace career counseling. Specialty decisions should be based on a combination of factors including clinical experience, mentorship, and personal interests.
